name: Follow the Abstract
description:
Well, this is a very unusual game.. I took me 9 months to make it. I do not know how to drescribe it.It is very abstract. I try to convey meaning through colors. In fact, the first name of the game was going to be "Follow the Scpectrum". However, it only has three colors. Thus, I decided to call it differently.

There is no Load option. So be careful.

Anyhow, I made it free so that everyone can enjoy. Feel free to comment and critique.However, feel free to support me any way possible.
